channel.title: 508 server help! I need help
channel.description: [pre]I have code my own server figmentscape.no-ip.biz and made a sucessful forums, but my server was a 317. And I am trying to learn how to make a 508 server. The only thing is I cannot find any of the files... Like client.java npchandler.java and all of those. If you could help me I would be very thankful[/pre]

item.title: 508 server help! I need help
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

I just did a very simalr thing to what you have done I have moved on from a 317 to a 508 the reson you can’t find any of these files is because the don’t exsist. It is COMPLEATLY differant from a 317 here is a small tut that will probably help you. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,422427.0.html

I havn’t gotten very far into 508’s yet its like restarting all over again. Basicly all I have done is changed some names But a big problem for me was the jdk version. I know it souds dumb but hopefully im saving you time. when you try to compile it will probably say " can not find the path specified…" just edit all the windows batch files to your jdk version @echo off Title Edgevillepk Compiler cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java pause
this is what you will see when you edit. were it says \jdk1.6.0_20\ just swich the 20 to what ever java jdk version you have.

Read full topic
